questions.question: Which is a pair of examples of history?

choices.answer: a sports event tomorrow and an artifact from 5,000 yrs. ago
a speech yesterday and an artifact from 4,000 yrs. ago
an invention from 100 years ago and a space flight in 3 yrs.
a fossil and a skyscraper that will be completed in two yrs.

questions.question: An archaeologist would most likely explore...

choices.answer: a mountain range that forms a border of a region
a forest or other unpopulated area
the site of an ancient battle
data about climate in a region
a journal entry
an article in an encyclopedia
data on weather and climate
a book about the people of ancient China
emperors
archaeologists
dentists
historians
artifactians
historians
archaeologists
no one

questions.question: The study of geography provides clues to all of the following except

choices.answer: the resources in a particular area
the climate of a region
understanding artifacts
why cities develop where they do

questions.question: What would early people look for as they decided where to settle?

choices.answer: a location that is in a region
a location near a center of culture
a location near enough food and water
a location near a center of transportation

questions.question: What is the scientific name for modern humans?

choices.answer: Australopithecus
Homo erectus
Homo habilis
homo sapiens

questions.question: Historians call the time before writing

choices.answer: the Stone Age
prehistory
the Neolithic Age
the Dark Age

questions.question: What effect did the ice ages have on early humans?

choices.answer: Early humans were forced to move to new environments
Early humans were forced to control large fires.
Early humans were forced to fish.
Early humans were forced to hunt.

questions.question: Tools in the Middle Stone Age were smaller and more complex than tools in the Early Stone Age..

choices.answer: because Early Humans braided grass clothing for travel.
because Early Humans sharpened rocks to razor-sharp edges.
because Early Humans invented hooks and the bow and arrow.
because Early Humans used spears rather than fishing hooks.

questions.question: Which statement best describes the Neolithic Revolution?

choices.answer: the shift from food gathering to hunting
major battle fought between people of Asia and Africa
the shift from food gathering to food producing
major battle fought between the peoples of Asia

questions.question: Why is the study of ancient bones important to us today?

choices.answer: It helps to develop better forms of agriculture
The study of ancient bones teaches us about our ancestors
it's the only soure of information for archaeologists to use
it helps us to develop modern technologies
